title.narrative: Support for democratic reform in Zimbabwe

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative will provide technical and financial assistance to build capacity of constitution making bodies, specifically: provide support to institutions and mechanisms that are mandated with constitutional reform management; public outreach to promote awareness of and participation in constitutional reform, targeting women, young people and other marginalised groups; effective media and communication strategy to strengthen the capacities of the media to enhance transparency of the process and to provide objective information for the public to make informed choices during the process; and support for the 2012 Zimbabwe National Population Census ahead of the 2013 elections. The total value of this initiative is $4.4 million over 4 years, starting 2009-10.
